_header: My joy it is from her to here

BLHar3362.First Lines: My Ioye it from hir to hereWhen þat my mynd ys euer to see
BLHar3362.Last Lines: To yoye my hert with play & [  ]ereffor I loue hur & she louyth me
BLHar3362.Note: Added to blank leaf at end of manuscript; ends “ffinis.”
